subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in web-app (ap-southeast-1)

messages.content:
Subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in web-app (ap-southeast-1)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

The web-app service in the ap-southeast-1 region is experiencing critical performance degradation, with a frontend load time of 6463.93 ms, significantly exceeding acceptable thresholds. This issue is likely caused by performance bottlenecks in the web application, potentially related to inefficient code or resource loading. Customers may experience slow page loads, leading to frustration and potential loss of engagement. This issue is recurring and requires immediate attention.

Service: web-app
Region: ap-southeast-1
Severity: critical
Event Type: frontend

Metrics:
{
  "load_time_ms": 6463.93,
  "bundle_size_kb": 371.18,
  "resources_loaded": 30
}

Workaround: Investigate the web application for performance bottlenecks, optimize resource loading, and consider increasing server capacity or optimizing backend queries. Notify customers about the ongoing issues to manage expectations.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.
